website_summaries.verdict: Sleek and sophisticated-looking, analog watch in rose gold stainless steel case with white face and band, fueled by light.
pros: Pretty rose gold-tone case with sturdy, white leather band.Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Never needs a battery – fueled by light through Eco-Drive feature.Also has protective mineral crystal dial window, date window, and buckle closure.Water resistant (not waterproof) to 99 feet
cons: Some buyers thought the window over the face scratched too easily

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this watch for a while and finally decided to buy it! I'm very happy with my purchase and I've been wearing it ever since. the design is simple and modern and that's why I love this watch. I thought it might be hard to match with different clothes but it is not. It will go both with casual and dressy styles. the size of the watch is perfect for me, not too small,not too big. I don't know long the white band is gonna last for me, but so far I'm very happy! BONUS: It is solar and I can stop spending money on changing batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Marzieh

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful watch. I really love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. I really love it. I received many comments on how lovely it looks. I was nervous whether it would work since it had not been in a lighted area during delivery and i had seen some reviews about watches like these not working when not charged for a few days. When it arrived it began to work as soon at it was placed in a lighted area. It's only been a few weeks but I can say that I haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Soobhanath

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for those interested in keeping time
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful watch and just fits every day occasion. No worries about battery life etc & great value for money to say the least. Bought it for Madam as part of her dressing code collection & it surpassed every other watch she wore before
customer_reviews.author: Samson Mwangi

customer_reviews.title: I love the looks of this watch so very much
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this watch so very much, but within two weeks it has stopped working 3 times. If I reset the time, it would work again for a few days, then stop again. I really hate sending it back since I loved it so much, but I refuse to deal with this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Adams

customer_reviews.title: The white band is easily dirty which I think I can accept
customer_reviews.text: This is very classy and timeless watch. The white band is easily dirty which I think I can accept. However, the watch band scratched noticeably with a few days of wear. I never wore it in the shower or while doing any sort of physical work or play. I only wore during the day in an office setting. Everything is ok with this price. Unfortunately, the quality of the watch band is not acceptable. Your company need to notice this and improve. update: it has been over two year, I still love the watch. It works great. It never run out of energy! That is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Magic Lori

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for a woman's wrist
customer_reviews.text: I have a half dozen Citizen watches, and wanted a birthday gift for a friend. This was perfect for a woman's wrist, and she loved it for her birthday. Quick shipping, genuine product, worked perfectly for my needs. Love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McKee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today in the mail. I live in a warm climate year round and so this is a perfect wardrobe staple. It's timeless, classy and feminine. The gold accent really enhances the look, making it seem more luxurious. I've already put it on and have received compliments on it! I'm very petite and have slender wrists. The supple leath seems to wrap around my wrist well. I had to use the second to last hole. I like that it had two strap placement holder thingies (one right after the clasp thing and an adjustable one so that the extra room on the strap isn't just flapping around). Definitely recommend for the chic in all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kha

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Watch
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch as a Mothers Day gift for my wife and she loved it. Nice dress watch. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Estong

customer_reviews.title: the watch is lovely but the band gets dirty quite soon and you cannot find a replacement without ...
customer_reviews.text: the watch is lovely but the band gets dirty quite soon and you cannot find a replacement without paying 60% of the watch price
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Stylish ECO- drive watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had this watch for over 3 months and has had no problems. This watch is very stylish with its white band. It was something different for my wife who has 2 other 'expensive' watches. I looked at many sites to find one that was eye-catching. This watch has no battery and reviews on the Eco Drive has indicated that is seems to last forever. The watch was reasonable on this site for it was over $400 at other shops. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright doesn’t fit well and no numbers not that great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aris

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have 3 of these watches and ...
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged in original box. Great product. I have 3 of these watches and no longer wear any other,
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! I had to get three links taken out, and now it fits perfectly. Love the simple face and smaller size since I have small wrists. Very happy with my purchase! Will post an update once I've had it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. I gave it to my sister in law as a graduation gift and she loves it. It is classic and beautiful but still makes a statement. I may be buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Zawisza

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. Very beautiful and elegant watch but the screen does scratch easily. She had a scratch on the glass after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Singh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, this price can buy such a product, too much value.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Xue Wei

customer_reviews.title: and love that it doesn't need a battery
customer_reviews.text: Simple, classic, and love that it doesn't need a battery. Leather band is soft, not hard and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: True Revu

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband brought this for my Xmas gift. I love it
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Very elegant shape and size, light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very elegant shape and size, light weight Cons: If you look closely between the band parts you'll see unpainted parts of the stainless steel It's a minor detail and it isn't noticable, but it counts considering the legacy of citizen watches
customer_reviews.author: Adel Abdel Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, the person it was gifted to was absolutely thrilled and loved the look and feel of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jihirshu Joshipura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but scratches
customer_reviews.text: I really don't want to give this watch one star. It is very classy and timeless however the face of the watch scratched noticeably with a few days of wear. It was only worn during the day in an office setting, never in the shower or while doing any sort of physical work or play. I'm sadly sending this back to Amazon. Unfortunately, the quality of the watch is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Almeida

customer_reviews.title: My best watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very classy, beautiful and I'm totally in love the watch. I have been receiving compliments anytime i put on. So cool
customer_reviews.author: Efyee

customer_reviews.title: I've wanted an Eco-Drive for a long time and this style was a a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch and will never need a new battery!!! I've wanted an Eco-Drive for a long time and this style was a a great price point!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Eye-catching watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as an anniversary gift for my wife. The first thing I did was to take It to the local jeweler to have an inscription made on the back of it. The ladies that worked there all commented on how beautiful the watch is. I love the idea that I will never ever ever have to buy a battery for it. The band seems to be well made and should hold up to daily use for a long time, I hope. That was really the only issue with the old watch- had to replace the band and battery about every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Toews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Friends are like me to send her a gift, is expected to be small, little and dainty for women
customer_reviews.author: gangwang

customer_reviews.title: A masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: I gave this beautiful watch to my wife and she is very exstatic. The watch is beautiful and elegant. Small enough to fit her style!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My significant other liked it as well as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: first watch without a battery. 1 week now on a charge working great
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lands

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect womans watch, not to big not to small and very elegant without being in your face loud.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S Rallison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Love that I don't have to deal with batteries. Keeps good time and looks nice on.
customer_reviews.author: M Weber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The watch is more beautiful then the picture gives it justice. Nothing I do not like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen J McPike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks even better in person and my wife really enjoys wearing it. Good price also.
customer_reviews.author: IRA ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from Batteries.... YEAH
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of replacing batteries in my existing watches. I had a Citizen watch some time ago and was happy with that so I decided to go to their brand again and update my technology. I use this as an every day. It is the low end of the price and features, but that's what I wanted. No second hand and no hash marks for numbers but since I'm old I know how to tell time without them. I love the black face. The date is extremely small but I get that info elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely!! Stylish and classic. Watchband runs big so needs adjustment for smaller wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wombles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch, but scratches
customer_reviews.text: My girl-friend likes the look of this watch, It looks just like the picture; However, I thought the mineral window on the watch should be hard, somehow more anti-scratch than glass, I was wrong, after 4 days of use, we found several indent on the window pf the watch My girl friend didn't even do sport or labor work This make me feel really bad I wonder can I return it or not
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the wife and she loved it. I will buy her the solid black one next.
customer_reviews.author: James Garsaud

customer_reviews.title: Great fashion piece
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and color of this watch. It really matches everything in my closet! Plus it doesn't need batteries!
customer_reviews.author: YRchloe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved the watch, so simple and elegant..works for all ocasions.
customer_reviews.author: ashp

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Citizen
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my mom! she loved it. Shape and size perfect for any wrist size. No clue on any tech details but she said it could have been a little more golden.
customer_reviews.author: Pranay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This a Beautiful delicate watch!!! Very feminine and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: william cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. I own a pair of eco-drives myself for almost 15 years now... And they are absolutely great. P.S. The only thing is it looks better on the picture than in real life... But still great time piece for quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Citizen
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on, easy to read the time and great price! The watch looks better on than what you're looking at on line.

customer_reviews.title: OVER CHARGED
customer_reviews.text: It was 160 I was chRged on the credit card 200$ why? I need to contact you via phone to discuss this matter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, very good
customer_reviews.text: Help colleagues to buy, he will send his girlfriend. Looks good, very good!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love at first sight......Very good design....I wear it to work....everyone likes it....This is my first eco drive and I'm looking for another one

customer_reviews.title: This is such a wonerful watch
customer_reviews.text: I just love everything about this watch; especially the fact that it is solar powered. I have never owned a high quality watch as this one in my life. It is very attractive looking. It is just wonderful to own one.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good, girlfriend liked, this is my best gift to send,! I wish you all a Happy New Year, thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch and i like it so much! I wanna buy it more! Good job and very fast shipping it takes only 5 days from ksa.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this watch for my wife and she loved it, is very classy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my wife and she loved it, is very classy and elegant, shes been wearing it ever since she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous in person
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Perfect size for my small wrist. I wish it was available in silvertone though but it is still a eye catching piece.
customer_reviews.author: fabriholic23

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WATCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. It can be worn with everything. Stylish sleek and will fit perfectly on your wrist due to the soft leather buckle strap. I love it. Keeps perfect time.

customer_reviews.title: Women Citizen watch eco-drive
customer_reviews.text: My friend love her new gift she think this is a beauriful watch. she would rate it higher but i gave it four stars.
